description: This trap alerts that an aps switchover has occurred and
the active port is identified by the tuple {hwPortBoard,

event.Summary: APS switchover occurred, active port is $v1

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD Fore-Apsgroup-MIB::apsSwitchOver Fore-Switch-MIB::hwPortName s EXAMPLE Fore-Switch-MIB::hwPortBoard i 9999 Fore-Switch-MIB::hwPortModule i 9999 Fore-Switch-MIB::hwPortNumber i 9999 Fore-TrapLog-MIB::trapLogIndex i 9999

description: A textual description of the port indicating
the Board Network module and Port (BNP) identifiers.
The module is indicated by a letter (A-D), while
the board and the port are indicated by numbers.
variables.name: Fore-Switch-MIB::hwPortName

description: The switch board index of this port.
variables.name: Fore-Switch-MIB::hwPortBoard

description: The network module number of this port.
variables.name: Fore-Switch-MIB::hwPortModule

description: The number of this port within its network module.
variables.name: Fore-Switch-MIB::hwPortNumber

description: The sequence number of this trap occurence. This
entry uniquely identifies an entry in the trapLogTable
variables.name: Fore-TrapLog-MIB::trapLogIndex
